org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging
Class AeDeploymentLog

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeDeploymentLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBaseErrorReporter, IAeDeploymentLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeStructuredDeploymentLog, AeUnstructuredDeploymentLog
public abstract class AeDeploymentLog
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeDeploymentLogger

Implementation of the error reporter used during the deployment of BPR's.

Field Summary
protected  java.lang.String mContainerName
          Container name (for logging output).

          Date log was created

protected AeDeploymentLog()
          No-arg constructor for subclasses to init the writer how they see fit.
